TopicTitle: A Mission to Minmus. (Great Pics) Realistic Design and Mission Profile.

Articles.Content:
This is the X-NOVA-MK1 rocket. It is designed to land on both of Kerbins moons. This is its first manned mission!

Javascript is disabled. View full album
That was a decent descent. Nice job.
Not Bad, congrats. A note on terminology: Perigee is the closest point of approach to the planet earth. On ascent it is still called the Apoapsis.
I see what you did there lol....noted for future spelling!
